name: Sanguine Melancholia
description:
Centuries have passed after an invasion by demonic entities, and humanity is on the brink of extinction. A young detective miraculously survives a train crash, and finds himself falsely accused of being a member of the rebel group Maelstrom. As things grow more and more chaotic, and more and more people are met, Adrien's view of the world is changed significantly. Despite this, not once does he lose sight of his destination.

With no train to take him, he sets out on foot for the beautiful mountain called Candlelight Tor, refusing to tell anyone why he's going. By his side is a young man who is essentially his polar opposite...and yet neither traveller wishes to leave the other's side.

Sanguine Melancholia is a tactical RPG set in a dystopian future where demons have decimated the population. The only way to make a difference is to Hunt, an illegal practice said to provide a rush like no other.

Features:
  • A story delivered in a standard visual novel format, centred around depression, anxiety, and romance. Fluidly shifts between combat and story segments.
  • A realistic, dynamic, and memorable cast of characters.
  • Numerous party members to choose from- customize your team to your liking.
  • A heavy focus on strategic, status-based combat: every enemy encounter requires a different strategy, as nearly every enemy has unique ailments they can inflict upon your team.
  • Bonus events to unlock and view at any time.
  • A diverse, powerful soundtrack featuring music from multiple artists.
  • One particularly entertaining android.
